meanings.sent1: She always misworded her thoughts when speaking in public.
meanings.sent2: I hope I don't misword my apology to him.
meanings.sent3: The comedian misworded his joke and ended up confusing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her miswording of the instructions led to a disastrous outcome.
meanings.sent5: Miswording can sometimes change the entire meaning of a sentence.

meanings.definition: The act of using the wrong words in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: His constant miswording made it hard to understand his point.
meanings.sent2: The miswording in the article caused confusion among the readers.
meanings.sent3: The miswording in the play added a comedic twist to the scene.
meanings.sent4: The miswording of the contract led to legal complications.
meanings.sent5: The miswording of the speech made it unforgettable for all the wrong reasons.
